price: 115. Zij zeiden: “O, Moesa! Of jij gooit eerst of wij gooien (eerst)?”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
